definition: dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
cave/hole/zero (unambiguous spoken form when spelling out numbers)/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Carp back and three pit hole to arrive, with the most dangerous carp back.
sentences.chinese: 鲫鱼背和三个石洞才能抵达，其中以鲫鱼背最险。

sentences.english: Process you knew, afterwards I surround at stone cave in.
sentences.chinese: 过程你全部都知道了，后来我就被困在了石洞里。

sentences.english: Huck followed. Four avenues opened out of the small cavern which the great rock stood in.
sentences.chinese: 哈克跟在后面，有大岩石的那个石洞分出四个叉道口。

sentences.english: The mouth of the pit was again covered with the stone, and the company returned.
sentences.chinese: 那个石洞的口重复用石头盖盖上，于是他们回去了。

sentences.english: It is said to be a grotto.
He smiled, and introduced them instantly into this "grotto."
sentences.chinese: 他微微笑了一下，立刻引她们到“石洞”去。

sentences.english: The dead were placed in a cave cut out of a rock it had shelves to lay out the dead on them.
sentences.chinese: 尸体被放置在石洞里，将石块切割成岩床来摆放尸体。

definition: Dongkou county in Shaoyang 邵陽|邵阳[Shao4 yang2], Hunan
Shimen or Shihmen township in New Taipei City 新北市[Xin1 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
